Line of Fire.name: Line of Fire
Line of Fire.flavor: Your first shot unbalances your foe, leaving it open to your allies’ attacks. You follow up with a quick volley, striking enemies that sought to block the path to your foe.
Line of Fire.requirement: You must be wielding a greatbow or a longbow.
Line of Fire.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the primary target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn. Make a secondary attack.
Line of Fire.secondaryTarget: One or two creatures granting cover to the primary target.

Follow Through.name: Follow Through
Follow Through.flavor: You use the enemies in front of your true target to redirect your shot to your foe.
Follow Through.requirement: You must be wielding a greatbow or a longbow.
Follow Through.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and any enemy granting cover to the primary target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Follow Through.onMiss: If no creature is granting cover to the primary target, you don’t expend this power. Otherwise, make a secondary attack.
Follow Through.secondaryTarget: One creature granting cover to the primary target
Follow Through.secondaryOnHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and any enemy granting cover to the secondary target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Strike Here.name: Strike Here
Strike Here.flavor: Like pins in a map, your arrows mark the vital spots on a foe’s body.
Strike Here.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy with a ranged attack, the next time an ally hits the target before the end of your next turn, he or she ignores the target’s resistances.
